[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”1664″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” module_class=”fp-page-header” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _dynamic_attributes=”title,background_image” _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|300|||||||” title_font_size=”90px” content_link_text_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.78)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”60%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9mZWF0dXJlZF9pbWFnZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7fX0=@” min_height=”600px” min_height_tablet=”420px” min_height_phone=”200px” min_height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”50px” title_font_size_phone=”32px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_shadow_style=”preset3″ content_link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” content_link_text_color__hover=”#FEC357″]

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/air-2020-header.jpg” alt=”2020 FP Annual Impact Report” title_text=”air-2020-header” url=”https://fp2020air.familypromise.org/” url_new_window=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”]

MOST RECENT DOCUMENTS

  • Family Promise Strategic Plan 2020
  • 2020 PDF Annual Impact Report
  • 2020 Financial Statements
  • 2020 Form 990
  • Summer 2021 Newsletter

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”]

ARCHIVES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”e2706452-e80d-40e5-9995-92bf7a295f77″ locked=”off”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2019″ open=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”]2019 Interactive Annual Impact Report

2019 PDF Annual Impact Report

2019 Financial Statement

2019 Form 990[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2018″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]2018 Interactive Annual Impact Report

2018 PDF Annual Impact Report

2018 Financial Statement

2018 Form 990[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2017″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

2017 Annual Report

2017 Financial Statement

2017 Form 990

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2016″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

2016 Annual Report

2016 Financial Statement

2016 Form 990

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2015″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

2015 Annual Report

2015 Financial Statement

2015 Form 990

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2014″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

2014 Annual Report

2014 Financial Statement

2014 Form 990

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2013″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

2013 Annual Report

2013 Financial Statement

2013 Form 990

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”40px||||false|false” locked=”off”]

POLICIES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”e2706452-e80d-40e5-9995-92bf7a295f77″ locked=”off”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”GOVERNANCE DOCUMENTS” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”]

Family Promise Conflict of Interest Policy

Family Promise Whistleblower Policy

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”PRIVACY POLICIES” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Family Promise Donor Privacy Policy

Family Promise Website Privacy Policy

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”]

To request a printed copy of our 2020 Annual Impact Report or previous Financial Statements and Forms 990, please contact us.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/FP-AIR2020-stats.jpg” alt=”2020 Annual Impact Report statistics” title_text=”FP-AIR2020-stats” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_blurb title=”Charity Navigator Rating” url=”https://www.charitynavigator.org/index.cfm?bay=search.summary&orgid=9926″ url_new_window=”on” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/4StarSquare-charitynavigator-300×300.jpeg” image_max_width=”250px” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”40px||||false|false” link_option_url=”https://www.charitynavigator.org/index.cfm?bay=search.summary&orgid=9926″ link_option_url_new_window=”on”]

Family Promise is one of only 71 nonprofits in the U.S. that has received a perfect, 100 point score from Charity Navigator. We are proud to have received 8 consecutive 4-star ratings, the top designation given by the nonprofit evaluator. View our rating here.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
